name: urban-puzzle-nsd
description: Full-stack web application with Node.js backend, React frontend, and Python data science service

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../python-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:python"
scripts.dev:python: cd python-service && source venv/bin/activate && python3 app.py
